channel.title: PROMISE program on Students for Equity and Advocacy in STEM
channel.description: Recent content in PROMISE program on Students for Equity and Advocacy in STEM

item.title: PROMISE framework
item.description: PROMISE: PROGRAM FOR UNDERREPRESENTED INCOMING STEM-INTERESTED STUDENTS In partnership with Students for Equity and Advocacy in STEM Background During the Fall 2020 semester and in partnership with Professor of Biology at Occidental College John McCormack, a cohort of Oxy students from Students for Equity and Advocacy in STEM began drafting the creation of PROMISE: a five-week summer immersive and residential program intended to engage incoming junior and senior high school students from Los Angeles in STEM.
